name: Myst IV: Revelation

files.setup: N/A:Select the EXE file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the EXE file downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Myst 4/Launch Myst 4 - Revelation.lnk
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_47
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- write_config:
    data:
      Detection.GameOptions:
        GraphicsQuality: 2
        MaximumResX: 1024
        MaximumResY: 768
        SuggestedResX: 1024
        SuggestedResY: 768
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Myst 4/bin/detect_config.ini
system:
  reset_desktop: true
  resolution: 1024x768
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
  dxvk: true
